EmailTemplate.name: Lenovo ThinkPad
EmailTemplate.subject: Superior workstation power meets mobility
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Imagine how this would help your business if you had this now.
Harness quad-core performance for the first time in a Lenovo Ultrabook with the ThinkPad P52s mobile workstation. This powerhouse boasts processors, pro-level graphics, business-class security, and expansive connectivity.
Please see the attached flyer, specifications and sample quote. If you would like pricing on any other model, please let me know. We have a great partnership with this company as their representatives are very responsive and happy to answer any questions you may have.
I look forward to further discussing your needs soon.
I appreciate your feedback,
John Baugnon Technology Account Manager john.baugnon@officedepot.com (888)707-7040 ext. 12737 https://business.officedepot.com
